Footer.companyDescription: An intelligent legal platform combining advanced legal analysis, precise drafting, and visual representation of facts.

HomePage.heroDescription: Welcome to the Legal AI platform, the ideal solution for legal practitioners and academics seeking to enhance their efficiency. We offer advanced AI-powered tools to facilitate daily work and improve research quality.
HomePage.missionIntro: By combining deep legal research with cutting-edge innovation, LegalAI is designed to help legal practitioners develop their expertise faster.
HomePage.missionDetail: Our team is committed to understanding your specific needs and strives to transform the legal profession with smart, AI-powered solutions built to serve your professional and academic needs.
HomePage.ourMissionText: We find that legal work needs to be as dynamic as the world it serves. We leverage the newest AI technologies to turn everyday tasks—research, document management, and drafting—into integrated, intelligent processes. We cut through administrative complexity, uncover profound insights, and concentrate on what really matters: providing outstanding legal services.
HomePage.ourApproachText: That's why we take a collaborative approach, working closely with our clients to deliver tailored solutions that align with their goals. With our devotion to accuracy, security, and innovation, we're spearheading a new age of legal excellence.
HomePage.collaborating: Collaborating to shape the future of law.

FAQ.a1: LegalAI is a legal technology platform that relies on artificial intelligence to support legal analysis, document drafting, and document interaction.
FAQ.a2: No. LegalAI is an assistive platform designed to support legal professionals with analysis and drafting tools that help them work more efficiently.
FAQ.a3: We apply the highest encryption and security standards. Your data is not used to train models and is not shared with third parties.

Quotes.title: Expert Opinions
Quotes.subtitle: What experts say about Legal AI?

q1.quote: Although AI can analyze and protect data, legal competence and capacity require empathy and human sense that will remain in human hands.
q1.author: Eric Schmidt
q1.context: This quote illustrates the current limits of AI in the legal field, where human understanding, empathy, and ethical context remain irreplaceable.

q2.quote: AI contributes to expanding access to justice by lowering the cost of legal services.
q2.author: Karen Pollen
q2.context: Highlights AI's role in reducing legal service costs, allowing broader access to legal support.

q3.quote: AI will not replace lawyers, but it will replace many of the tasks and methods they are used to using.
q3.author: Richard Susskind
q3.role: Professor and Advisor in Legal Tech
q3.context: Suggests AI reshapes the profession by automating routine tasks without threatening the existence of lawyers.

q4.quote: AI in the legal field is not meant to dispense with lawyers, but to enable them to use tools that make them more productive.
q4.author: Andrew Arruda
q4.context: Emphasizes AI as a support tool for productivity.

q5.quote: Not using AI might one day be considered legal malpractice! Similar to a late 20th-century lawyer doing everything manually despite computers existing.
q5.author: Tom Girardi
q5.context: Indicates AI might become an essential professional tool.

q1.question: What is LegalAI platform?
q1.answer: LegalAI is a legal technology platform that relies on artificial intelligence to support legal analysis, document drafting, document interaction, and visual representation of legal facts, while adhering to professional standards and privacy protection.

q2.question: Does LegalAI replace lawyers?
q2.answer: No. LegalAI is an assistive platform and not a substitute for lawyers or human decision-making. The platform aims to support legal professionals with analysis, drafting, and clarification tools that help them work more efficiently.

q3.question: What's the difference between the intermediary legal chat and the proprietary legal model?
q3.answer: The intermediary chat routes requests between multiple AI models to select the most suitable for each task, while the proprietary legal chat relies on a platform-owned legal model specifically configured for advanced legal analysis and drafting.

q4.question: What is meant by visual reconstruction of legal facts?
q4.answer: It's a service that transforms unstructured data such as reports, testimonies, and evidence into visual simulations that illustrate the sequence of events, aiming to support legal understanding and analysis and enhance visual evidence.

q5.question: Who can use LegalAI platform?
q5.answer: The platform is designed for legal practitioners, law firms, legal researchers, academics, and law students, as well as legal teams within organizations.

q6.question: Is the platform compliant with European and international privacy standards?
q6.answer: The platform was designed according to strict principles of data protection and digital governance, in line with privacy and compliance requirements applicable in the European and international context.

q7.question: Does the platform require advanced technical expertise?
q7.answer: No. LegalAI's interface is designed to be simple and user-friendly, allowing legal professionals to benefit from its capabilities without needing advanced technical knowledge.

q8.question: How can I start using the platform?
q8.answer: You can start by creating an account, then selecting the appropriate service and uploading documents or entering facts, and the platform will begin providing the required analytical and drafting support.

q9.question: How is my data protected?
q9.answer: We apply the highest encryption and security standards to all data. We provide encrypted email services, secure VPN, and protected cloud storage. Your data is not used to train models and is not shared with third parties.

q10.question: What is the credit system?
q10.answer: The credit system is a flexible pricing system that allows you to pay per use. Each service has a specific cost in credits, and you can purchase credits according to your needs.
